WEATHER FORECAST FOR 15 NOVEMBER 2023
Issued at 12.00 noon on 14 November 2023
The low-level atmospheric disturbance over the island persists.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in most provinces of the island after

provinces.

North-western and Eastern provinces.
